name: 灵异爱情.冷
description:
This is a stand-alone adventure casual game. Players know other game characters and experience stories in the game world.

Game overview.
"Ordinary people will live a dull life? Where to go in the face of choice? In the face of temptations such as money and beauty, adhere to principles or obey nature?

In the game. In the mountains, forests, fields, villages and other places, I make friends with all kinds of people. When I face danger once in a while, how do I judge and choose? Ghosts in the spirit world often appear in the underworld, such as chasing souls, collecting debts, doing things, falling in love and so on. The one I love, wait for me."

In the game, players use the mouse and keyboard to operate.

Using game keys,
A key, a paragraph of text in front, screen.
L key, followed by a paragraph of text, screen.
Enter key, followed by a paragraph of text, screen.
Right arrow, the next text in the current chapter.
Spacebar to display all the current text.
ESC key, exit and go to the archive option.
